abstract: Tensions between members of Silver Gull Beach Club on Rockaway Peninsula in Queens strain toward end of season, boiling over into confrontations, some fueled by alcohol, that have at times necessitated intervention by police; social drama at one of last of New York City's private beach clubs has been intriguing enough that California production company had contacted club about possibility of shooting reality television show there (Series: Summer at the Silver Gull).

headline.print_headline: Bikini Moms and Petty Squabbles at a Beach Club Fit for Reality TV
headline.main: ‘Bikini Moms’ and Petty Squabbles at a Beach Club Fit for Reality TV

snippet: There is no shortage of characters or drama at the Silver Gull Beach Club, a private summer colony in Queens where tensions rise as the season nears its end....
lead_paragraph: There is no shortage of characters or drama at the Silver Gull Beach Club, a private summer colony in Queens where tensions rise as the season nears its end.
